name: High Octane Amoeba Part 2
description:
Important:

This is a version of the game from the score space jam with additional fixes to game breaking bugs after the jam's completion. 

Mouse for movement, and Escape to pause

This game spawns more difficult enemies and bosses as time goes on. 

Unfortunately, the world displays a more sinister side if you’re an amoeba. You have but one task, something that we all must do, stay alive. Evade the most menacing enemies, an antiseptic spray bottle, an army of algae and a plethora of bacteria are just a few of the adversaries that you will encounter. With these kinds of antagonists, you should just give up, shouldn’t you? Do not despair, because although you may be but a tiny amoeba, life has still given you gifts. Absorb scrumptious foods to keep your energy topped off and utilize your noble grappling hook to dodge deadly blows. You will only thrive if you manage to survive, although you can’t hide, you can definitely run. See if you have what it takes to endure what can only be described as unendurable pain in High Octane Amoeba.

 Instructions:
  1. To move, click on a point on the screen to use your grappling hook, keep your momentum in mind. 
  2. Your energy will continuously deplete over time, consuming food will replenish it. If your energy is at 0, you will continuously lose HP.
  3. To absorb food, simply ram your gelatinous body into it, food will also replenish a small amount of HP. 
  4. Avoid enemies for as long as you can.
